title: How is the company NIIT Technologies Noida for a fresher? - Quora

response.answer_text: I joined NIIT Tech (NTL) as a fresher three years back as a fresher in Bangalore. Your question is for the Noida location ,i understand very well. NIIT has a very big campus in Noida and it’s a lot more fun there than in bangalore.(That’s what my fellow colleague who worked there told me). Bangalore branch is not that big but it’s location is not that remote. However, Noida location is located a bit remote location and they have shuttle services to and fro from the city. So i guess it’s no big deal for freshers. Career growth wise NIIT embraces its candidate in a well disciplined manner. For all my three years in NIIT i did not have a single bad experience . After all it’s not the company but the manager and the nature of the work one should put more emphasis on. Let me know if you need to know anything else more.:) Hope this answer helps :)
